overview:
Danny DeMichele is the Founder and CEO of eVisibility. He maintains eVisibilityâ€™s position as the leading innovator of customized Internet marketing strategies.

He has streamlined the process of successful e-business solutions providing marketing, web page design, web hosting, programming, content development, copy writing that closes sales and a host of other solutions through a dedicated team of experts assembled at eVisibility.

Danny DeMichele has unrivaled experience in building e-business infrastructures and an unparalleled understanding of Internet marketing. He has founded, marketed and sold several successful e-commerce, Internet marketing and health companies over the past 10 years and now focuses exclusively on providing cutting edge e-business strategies to clients.
